content: leaving about a three inch tail chain 6 slip_stitch in first chain to form loop double_crochet 13 times into loop continue working in the round add two double_crochet into each stitch for about 28 times or 56 total double crochets one double_crochet into 20 stitches this helps start the curve of the double ply before the decreases double_crochet 2 together for approximately 46 times or until the center hole is closed leave about a three inch tail feed one tail through to the other side of the scrubbie tie both tails together in a knot and then feed both ends through to the side where you cut off the tails so a portion of the tails remains inside the scrubbie the scrubbie yarns i have listed are very forgiving and if you miss stitches or counts you can just wing it until you have the size you want the stitches i listed here will end up with about a palm sized scrubbie please feel free to contact me if you have any questions
